title: SIA Campaign Builder for DRC
text: goal rdcAVS streamline process creating SIA campaign folders DRC. package designed portable secure. Data geographies permissions stored locally uploaded user directly. Currently, package comes campaign template, future versions allow users upload modified campaign template file. package still development, beta version available.

title: SIA Campaign Builder for DRC
text: can install development version rdcAVS GitHub :

title: SIA Campaign Builder for DRC
text: one function package. deploy app locally, simply run following code:

title: SIA Campaign Builder for DRC
Run the rdcAVS application — campagneApp
text: rdcAVS application deploys web browser locally. consists three tabs creates campaign, add geographic information, set Google Drive permissions. Creating campaign outputs folder prefixed "CAMPAGNE_", contains hierarchical structure, going largest geographic unit (Province) lowest geographic unit (Zone de Sant9). Within Zone de Sant9 folder, contains template file.

title: Run the rdcAVS application — campagneApp
Run the rdcAVS application — campagneApp
Run the rdcAVS application — campagneApp
text: campaign creation tab takes valid input based given geographic information tab. Likewise, entries permissions database also depend geographic information tab ensure consistency, especially non-global permissions set. permissions geographic information stored locally user's machine.

Initialize an SIA campaign — init_campaign
Initialize an SIA campaign — init_campaign
code: init_campaign(   start_date,   end_date,   campaign_name = Sys.Date(),   campaign_folder = getwd(),   prov_target = NULL,   antenne_target = NULL,   zs_target = NULL,   gdb = NULL,   zs_masque = system.file("extdata", "zs_masque_template.xlsx", package = "rdcAVS"),   output_folder = campaign_folder )

title: Initialize an SIA campaign — init_campaign
text: start_date str Start date campaign. end_date str End date campaign. campaign_name str name SIA campaign. Defaults date ran. campaign_folder str Path campaign folder. Defaults getwd(). prov_target str province vector province names. antenne_target str Antenne vector antenne. zs_target str vector Zone de Santes targeted campaign. gdb rda rda file Geo database. zs_masque str Path masque template. output_folder str output campaign.

title: Initialize an SIA campaign — init_campaign
